original_text: You will come from your country far away in the north. You will bring many soldiers with you. All of them will be riding on horses. They will be a great army of many soldiers.
korean_text: 네가 네 고국 땅 북쪽 끝에서 많은 백성 곧 다 말을 탄 큰 무리와 능한 군대와 함께 오되

sentences.original_text: You will come from your country far away
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 머나먼 네 나라에서 올 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will bring many soldiers with you
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 많은 군사들을 데리고 올 것이다

sentences.original_text: All of them will be riding on horses
They will be a great army
